titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable, the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of Richard Pight, Clerk of the Irons in the Mint, in the Tower of London
titleStmt.author: Pight, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication conjectured by Wing.
An earlier petition on the same subject--his position and arrears of pay--was addressed by the author to the Council of State.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
